thread.title: Trump, Bentley top targets of Comic Cowboys' Mardi Gras satire
thread.title_full: Trump, Bentley top targets of Comic Cowboys' Mardi Gras satire

author: Lawrence Specker | lspecker@al.com
title: Trump, Bentley top targets of Comic Cowboys' Mardi Gras satire
text: If ever a year provided a wealth of material to Mobile's infamous Comic Cowboys, the interval since Mardi Gras 2016 was it. Given the rise of President Donald Trump, a tawdry scandal involving the governor and no shortage of local foibles, the boys from Wragg Swamp barely had to break a sweat.
